casebody.data:
Ashley Keith Pittman, and Wife, Deanna Pittman
v.
Henry Moncure Motors, Inc., Mobile Home Sales, a Corporation, and Crestline Homes, Inc., a Corporation No. 334P15 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Geoffrey Paul Davis, Attorney at Law, For Henry Moncure Motors, Inc. Gilbert Chichester, Attorney at Law, Rocky Mount. Jimmie R. Barnes, Attorney at Law, Roanoke Rpds, For Pittman, Ashley Keith, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st of October 2015 by Defendant (Henry Moncure Motors, Inc.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
